page.title: 08CHICKEN FARM
page.content: This factory farm is roughly west of the village .It takes about 2 acres of land.The farm is used for producing eggs and it produces 9,200 eggs a day .They have 11,000 hens. There are 5 people who work at the factory and the factory is about 20 years old. The factory is housed in 2 main huts and the person who manages the farm lives in a bungalow on the site.They have a guard dog and 2 pet dogs. To the west of the Chicken farm is the main railway line from London to Edinburgh .It use to stop not far from the farm but nowadays it is a disused station .You can still see the big signal box ,the waiting_room and the station house ,but it is a ghost station.
